name: forge-npm-pkg
description: A CLI tool to scaffold production-ready npm packages with modern best practices

scripts.dev:test: npm run dev:clean && npm run build && node dist/index.js .dev-test/my-package --skip-install
scripts.dev:test:quick: npm run dev:clean && npm run build && node dist/index.js .dev-test/my-package -y --skip-install
scripts.dev:test:full: npm run dev:clean && npm run build && node dist/index.js .dev-test/my-package -y
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && npx vitest run tests/e2e.test.ts
scripts.test:all: npm run typecheck && npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test:all
